inputVolume.label: Input Volume
inputVolume.description: Adjust microphone sensitivity for optimal voice recognition
inputVolume.tooltip: Drag slider to adjust how sensitive your microphone is to input

outputVolume.label: Output Volume
outputVolume.tooltip: Adjust how loud the AI voice responses are

noiseReduction.label: Noise Reduction
noiseReduction.description: Filter out background noise during recording
noiseReduction.tooltip: Higher settings remove more background noise but may affect voice quality

vadThreshold.label: Voice Activity Detection
vadThreshold.description: Set sensitivity for detecting when you're speaking
vadThreshold.tooltip: Lower values detect quieter speech but may trigger more false positives

voiceSelection.label: Voice Selection
voiceSelection.tooltip: Select different voices for the AI responses

speakingRate.label: Speaking Rate
speakingRate.description: Adjust how fast the AI speaks
speakingRate.tooltip: Control the speed of AI voice responses

pitch.label: Voice Pitch
pitch.description: Adjust the pitch of the AI voice
pitch.tooltip: Fine-tune how high or low the AI voice sounds

primaryLanguage.label: Primary Language
primaryLanguage.tooltip: Choose the main language for the application interface

secondaryLanguage.label: Secondary Language
secondaryLanguage.tooltip: Optional secondary language for fallback support

rtl.label: Right-to-Left Text
rtl.tooltip: Switch text direction for RTL languages like Arabic or Hebrew
